TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TypeCodeDomSerializer extends System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializerBase

summary.span: 将对象序列化为新类型。

span.span: Serializes an object to a new type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类执行相同的任务，但通过此类对象的序列化定义了新类型。The class performs the same tasks as a , but serializing an object through this class defines a new type.

summary.span: 将给定类型声明反序列化。

span.span: Deserializes the given type declaration.
The root object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将以前序列化的代码类型声明反序列化。The method deserializes a previously serialized code type declaration. 下表显示了任务默认实现将执行。The following table shows the tasks default implementation performs. |任务Task|描述Description| |----------|-----------------| |区分大小写检查Case Sensitivity Checks|该实现搜索服务以确定是否它应将成员视为区分大小写或不区分大小写。The implementation searches for a service to decide if it should treat members as case sensitive or case insensitive.| |语句排序Statement Sorting|在表中存储的所有成员变量和局部变量 init 方法中。All member variables and local variables from init methods are stored in a table. 然后在 init 方法中的每个语句会添加到分组根据其左上方，以便分配或操作系统特定的变量上的所有语句都分组在该变量下一个语句集合。Then each statement in an init method is added to a statement collection grouped according to its left-hand side, so all statements assigning or operating on a particular variable are grouped under that variable. 变量的任何语句将被丢弃。Variables that have no statements are discarded.| |反序列化Deserialization|每个变量的语句集合会根据变量的反序列化。The statement collections for each variable are deserialized according to the variable.| 下表显示了服务方法要求。The following table shows the services the method requires. |服务Service|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| ||而不是必需的该服务，如果可用，用于确定序列化应区分大小写或不区分大小写。While not strictly necessary, the service, if available, is used to determine if the serialization should be case sensitive or case insensitive.| ||如果对象不存在名称表中查询的反序列化期间进行。If an object does not exist in the name table during deserialization, a query for is made. 如果成功执行此查询，该容器是针对的对象检查。If this query succeeds, the container is checked for the object. 容器还用作组件所需的任何容器参数替代项。The container is also used as a stand-in for any container argument needed by components.|

span.span: or is .

The value to use for serialization.

summary.span: 返回存储用于序列化成员的语句的方法。

span.span: Returns the method where statements used to serialize a member are stored.

returns.span: 用于发出给定成员的所有初始化代码的方法。

span.span: The method used to emit all of the initialization code for the given member.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法返回要为给定成员发出所有初始化代码的方法。The method returns the method to emit all of the initialization code for the given member. 默认实现返回一个空构造函数。The default implementation returns an empty constructor. 如果相同的方法将返回多个值，则应返回方法的同一个实例。If the same method is to be returned for multiple values, the same instance of the method should be returned. 可以使用字典记住所创建的方法。You can use the dictionary to remember methods you have created. `typeDecl`参数还可用于添加基础结构方法。The `typeDecl` parameter can also be used to add infrastructure methods. 例如，如果你想要发出的每个对象单独的方法，需要所有这些方法又调用单个方法。For example, if you want to emit a separate method for each object, you need a single method that calls all of these methods in turn. 此方法可以添加到根据需要的代码类型声明。This method can be added to the code type declaration as needed.

span.span: , , or is .

abstract member Serialize : System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager * obj * System.Collections.ICollection -> System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDeclaration override this.Serialize : System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager * obj * System.Collections.ICollection -> System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDeclaration

param.span: 用于序列化的序列化管理器。

The object to serialize.
Optional collection of members.
Can be or empty.

summary.span: 通过创建定义根的新类型声明将对象根序列化。

span.span: Serializes the object root by creating a new type declaration that defines root.
A that defines the root object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法序列化的给定的根对象和要创建新的类型定义的成员的可选集合。The method serializes the given root object and optional collection of members to create a new type definition. 如果`members`集合包含的值，这些值进行序列化。If the `members` collection contains values, these values are serialized. 值本身可能会序列化为成员变量或本地变量。Values themselves may serialize as either member variables or local variables. 此决定通过搜索调用的对象的扩展程序属性`GenerateMember`。This determination is done by searching for an extender property on the object called `GenerateMember`. 如果`true`，生成成员。If `true`, a member is generated. 否则，生成本地变量。Otherwise, a local variable is generated. 为方便起见，`members`集合可以包含的根对象。For convenience, the `members` collection can contain the root object. 在这种情况下，根对象不也添加为成员或局部变量。In this case, the root object is not also added as a member or local variable. 返回类型的名称取自根对象的名称，如果它是命名的对象。The name of the returned type is taken from the root object’s name, if it was a named object. 如果没有，从根类的简单类型名称会生成一个名称。If not, a name is fabricated from the simple type name of the root class. 下表显示了执行的默认实现的任务方法。The following table shows the tasks performed by the default implementation of the method. |任务Task|描述Description| |----------|-----------------| |种子设定的上下文Context Seeding|使用数据，包括初始化序列化上下文和 The serialization context is initialized with data including the and | |成员序列化Member Serialization|下一步，指导的所有成员和调用。Next, walks all of the members and calls . 因为序列化完成才有机会在，这可确保不两次执行序列化。Because serialization is done opportunistically in , this ensures that serialization is not done twice.| |根序列化Root Serialization|接下来，序列化的根对象和它的语句添加到语句集合。Next, the root object is serialized and its statements are added to the statement collection.| |语句的集成Statement Integration|所有对象进行序列都化后，方法为语句排序，并将它们添加到方法返回从。After all objects are serialized, the method orders the statements and adds them to a method returned from . 最后，构造函数会生成调用所有方法返回从。Finally, a constructor is fabricated that calls all of the methods returned from .| - 下表显示了对象方法是将上下文堆栈上。The following table shows the objects the method places on the context stack. |实例Instance|描述Description| |--------------|-----------------| ||此序列化程序。This serializer. 派生的类可能会发现可以将公共属性添加到此类。Deriving classes may find it useful to add public properties to this class.| ||正在创建的类型。The type being created. 大多数对象不需要直接访问。Most objects do not need direct access to this.|

span.span: or is .
